Apart from offering high-quality academic studies, UNIPA invests on making students’ years of study creative and enjoyable.

Improving student life is an integral part of the UNIPA philosophy; thus, it strives for enabling students to gain significant experiences, to meet new people and feel that they belong to an organized community, with a strong focus on their social, intellectual and cultural development.

Meetings, exchange of ideas, promotion of practices, new places and new people are important and integral parts of student life that are developed both within and outside the three UNIPA campuses, through the Universities strong synergies with local communities and society at large.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
